text: Bernd Fischer (18 December 1936 - 13 August 2020) was a German mathematician. He was best known to his works to the classification of simple groups, and he discovered several of the sporadic groups. He helped discover 3-transposition groups and created the three Fischer groups.The Mathematics Genealogy Project - Bernd Fischer ==References== Category:German mathematicians Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths
